perturbation.original_text:
This Content License Agreement (“Agreement”) is between Global Music International, Inc. d/b/a Independent Music Network (IMNTV), located at 20
Old Stagecoach Road, Redding, Connecticut, 06896 (“IMNTV”), and Distributor, as set forth below, and describes the terms and conditions under which
Distributor will distribute Programming provided by IMNTV as described herein. Distributor’s distribution of the Programming is subject to the Master Terms of
Service (“MTS”) attached hereto as Exhibit A. All capitalized terms shall have the meaning set forth on the MTS. In consideration for the mutual promises and
covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:
Distributor’s authorized signature, is REQUIRED:
perturbation.changed_text:
This Content License Agreement (“Agreement”) is between Global Music International, Inc. d/b/a Independent Music Network (IMNTV), located at 20
Old Stagecoach Road, Redding, Connecticut, 06896 (“IMNTV”), and the Licensee, as set forth below, and describes the terms and conditions under which
Distributor will distribute Programming provided by IMNTV as described herein. The Distributor's distribution of the Programming is subject to the Master Terms of
Service (“MTS”) attached hereto as Exhibit A. All capitalized terms shall have the meaning set forth on the MTS. In consideration for the mutual promises and
covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:
Distributor’s authorized signature, is REQUIRED:
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Distributor' is changed to 'Licensee' in the initial definition of the agreement, but 'Distributor' is still used in the following sentences within the same paragraph, creating confusion as to which entity the agreement pertains.

perturbation.original_text:
IMNTV will extend the Agreement on the same terms and conditions for additional one-year terms,
providing Distributor and IMNTV agree, predicated on satisfactory performance by both parties
perturbation.changed_text:
IMNTV will extend the Agreement on the same terms and conditions for additional one-year terms,
providing MobileVision and IMNTV agree, predicated on satisfactory performance by both parties
perturbation.explanation: By changing 'Distributor' to 'MobileVision,' which is the distributor's name, we create ambiguity. Is MobileVision acting in its capacity as a distributor, or is it another entity altogether? This can lead to disputes about who needs to agree to the extension.

perturbation.original_text:
Throughout the Term, IMNTV shall designate at least one (1) staff member to provide Distributor with all reasonably necessary
assistance, information and support relating to its obligations herein including, but not limited to, updating and maintaining the Programming.
perturbation.changed_text:
Throughout the Term, IMNTV shall designate at least one (1) staff member to provide the Partner with all reasonably necessary
assistance, information and support relating to its obligations herein including, but not limited to, updating and maintaining the Programming.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Distributor' is changed to 'Partner', creating confusion as to who the parties should render the services. It is uncertain whether 'Distributor' or 'Partner' are interchangable, and creates uncertainty to enforcement of the obligations.
